# [Interview #22: LOC Signing Report - Daniel Rouk, Entry #21](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=22#21)

#### [Robert JordanÂ (18 October 1994)](http://groups.google.com/group/rec.arts.sf.written.robert-jordan/msg/da92bee7eae49851)

There was one ominous hint that Robert Jordan is going to pull a Tom Sawyer and watch his own funeral. Since we know that Jordan is only a pen name, this is entirely possible.
